item.description:
Beijing: The City Renewed
When: Wednesday, February 16, 10am
Where: Munce Conference Room, 20 Derne Street, Suffolk University, Downtown Boston
Closest T station: Blue LIne, Bowdoin
Cost: Free
More information: http://www.suffolk.ed...

Dr. Michael Chapman, Associate Professor at Peking University in Beijing and a Suffolk grad, will give a presentation and show images about how this ancient Chinese city is being revitalized.

With 60+ universities and colleges in Boston and nearby areas, there are almost always fascinating presentations, lectures, and performances going on, often free of charge. Most are listed on the universities' and colleges' websites - check their events calendars.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Beijing: The City Renewed
